channel.title: Combat Formula
channel.description:
Does anyone have a 90-100% acurate combat formula?
There was one posted a while ago, but it wasn't rlly acurate.. 99 range, 99 mage, 99 hp = level 26.
99 mage, 99 hp = level 1.
..
Anyone got one thats more acurate? And i'm not after one thats just ripped out of a random source, cause chances are, it's bullshit.

Lol ppl would propably help u if they could…

item.description:

untelo:

Btw, how u change the server combat formula? Mine sucks too, all cb skills 99 is 185 cb lol.

-.-…

return 185; or anyting
than just cange 195 to 126[/quote]

-.-…

Gtfo out if your not helping me. I know i’m being a bit harsh, but i help almost everyone i can, and no1 can help me, cause everyone is dumb…
